<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lightslayer Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1670) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Oath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=119" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings. Add the following tenet to your code, after the other tenets. “You must banish or slay [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) you encounter as long as you have a reasonable chance of success; in the incredibly unlikely event you find an evil celestial, you don't have to banish or kill it.”

 When you use your champion's reaction against a celestial, the extra damage you deal with Strikes increases by 1 (or by 2 at 9th level and by 3 at 16th level).
name: Lightslayer Oath
